title: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late.
EB: Currently, to save my work, I have to quit the wizard, save the files, open the wizard again, and then re-enter all the required fields to create a JAR. I should be allowed to create a JAR with unsaved editors. If that is not possible, there should be a dialog allowing me to save my work before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
